title: Acrobat Pro 7 [portable]
description:
Portable version of Adobe Acrobat Pro 7.0

Also included is the S&S Keygen in case you need it. If so, please remember to go offline before registering and choose the &#039;register by phone&#039; option. Copy the Request Code that Acrobat gives you and put it into the keygen. Select Acrobat 7.0 from the keygen pulldown menu and hit the Generate button. Copy this number into Acrobat and that should do it. Pretty straight forward but just in case.

Also included are Acrobat Distiller.exe and Adobe Designer.exe. If you want to delete them you can but they can give you direct access to those programs inside of the Acrobat.exe without having to launch Acrobat (They are essentially shortcuts).

To access Distiller and Designer from within Acrobat just launch the Acrobat.exe then:

Advanced - Forms - Create New Form (for Adobe Designer)

Advanced - Adobe Distiller (for Acrobat Distiller)

Hope you find this useful.
